Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE is followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that eventually lead to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE events that are not followed by any approval or rejection (i.e., orphaned submissions)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of variants starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are resubmitted after a rejection by any actor
Metric: the sum of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are directly followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER (without rejection)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE leading to successful Payment Handled versus those leading to any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE occurring in variants that contain more than one submission due to prior rejections
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are followed within the same case by Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION before reaching PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that result in a completed process (ending in Payment Handled) without any rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants where Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE is immediately succeeded by Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and then rejected
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are part of loops involving multiple rejections and resubmissions
Metric: the sum of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE with case:Amount above 100 euros that are later rejected by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER versus those leading to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur in cases where the budget owner and supervisor are the same person, yet still involve PRE_APPROVER rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that bypass PRE_APPROVER entirely (i.e., go directly to ADMINISTRATION or SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of all rejections by PRE_APPROVER that originate from a Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (i.e., share of this subject activity in PRE_APPROVER rejections)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of unique cases where Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE is followed at any point by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE per year to assess temporal trends in submission volume
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
